p: The most common AEs were hematological toxicities. There were no occurrences of grade 3 or 4 severe neutropenia, anemia, or thrombocytopenia. All hematological toxicities were nonsevere (grade 1 or 2); anemia occurred in 12 patients (92%), thrombocytopenia occurred in five patients (39%), and leucopenia occurred in one patient (8%) (TableÂ 3).
